results.question: When will my root canal claim of Rs 25,000 be settled?
results.answer: Information not found in the document.

results.question: I have done an IVF for Rs 56,000. Is it covered?
results.answer: Information not found in the document.

results.question: I did a cataract treatment of Rs 100,000. Will you settle full?
results.answer: Your cataract treatment will be settled up to 25% of the Sum Insured or Rs. 40,000 per eye, whichever is lower.

results.question: Give me a list of documents to be uploaded for hospitalization due to heart surgery.
results.answer: For hospitalization due to heart surgery, upload the discharge summary, investigation/diagnostic test reports with prescription, OT notes or surgeon's certificate, implant stickers/invoices if applicable, MLR/FIR if applicable, NEFT details with a cancelled cheque, and KYC if the claim exceeds Rs. 1 Lakh.

results.question: I have raised a claim for hospitalization for Rs 25,000. What will I get?
results.answer: The reimbursement amount will be subject to a 5% co-pay if the insured is 75 years old or younger, or a 15% co-pay if they are older than 75.
